title: Remove connection error UI blocking main app access

requirements.text: Remove the BackendConnectionGate component wrapper from the App.tsx router configuration to prevent connection diagnostics UI from blocking access to the dashboard and other application modules

quotes: can you remove that completely Connection Failed Unable to connect to the backend
you want me to completely remove the connection error handling code
I'll completely remove all the connection error handling code

acceptanceCriteria: Users can immediately access the dashboard without seeing connection error messages
No connection diagnostics UI, retry buttons, or error messages are displayed
The main app (dashboard and other modules/modals) renders directly without being blocked

requirements.text: Remove the BackendConnectionGate.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/common/ since it is no longer used
acceptanceCriteria: The BackendConnectionGate.tsx file is deleted from the codebase
No unused imports or references to BackendConnectionGate remain

constraints: Preserve all other authentication and approval gate functionality (AuthApprovalGate, AppErrorBoundary)
nonGoals: Replacing the connection gate with alternative error handling
Modifying retry logic or connection diagnostics elsewhere in the app
Changing authentication flow or approval processes
